# Online Exam System - Frontend Development Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js 14+ frontend application for an Online Exam System with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Socket.IO client for real-time features
- React Hook Form with Zod validation
- Axios for API calls
- TanStack Query for data fetching
- Zustand for state management

## Project Structure
- `app/` - Next.js App Router structure
- `components/` - Reusable UI components
- `hooks/` - Custom React hooks
- `lib/` - Utilities and configurations
- `styles/` - Tailwind and global styles
- `types/` - TypeScript type definitions
- `utils/` - Utility functions

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and utilities
- Follow React best practices and hooks
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind
- Use shadcn/ui for consistent UI components
- Integrate with backend API running on PostgreSQL
- Implement real-time features with Socket.IO
